articles.title: Lufthansa cancels nearly all flights in Germany on Wednesday due to strikes - CNN Video
articles.description: Lufthansa announced the cancellation of nearly all flights in Germany on Wednesday due to strike action, the company said in a press release.

articles.title: How the climate bill could save you money on electricity, cars and appliances
articles.description: Democrats' new climate bill contains a bevy of tax incentives aimed at pushing consumers, developers, small businesses and others towards clean energy.

articles.title: Top Russian hypersonic missile scientist arrested on treason charge
